Text: Thanks to all our people around the world for continuing to make @Accenture a great place to work. Together, we have been named a Top 10 Great Place to Work 2022 in six countries. Learn more about our Awards + Recognition - https://t.co/rbiF3qsMUj. #GPTW #100BestCos https://t.co/fzlsLg4jQA
The images and voices from Ukraine are tragic. Accenture is committed to supporting humanitarian aid to address the crisis and we stand with all in the global community who are calling for peace.

Thanks, @PolenCapital, for this timely discussion on ESG. ESG is about doing the right thing and delivering results, and it is great for business. Our strategy at @Accenture is to create 360° Value for all stakeholders: our clients, people, shareholders, partners & communities. https://t.co/WtS3Vpgq4b

Companies using cloud more continuously and strategically realize more value and a competitive advantage. This is why, as @Accenture Cloud First Lead @KarthikSNarain says, IT infrastructure’s renaissance is critical to business success in the cloud. https://t.co/vtPtAhcIMo

Not every student is college-bound, but every student is bound for the digital economy. Talent creation is accelerated by public and private partnerships. Thanks to @NatlGovsAssoc, @SecRaimondo, @BestBuy's Corie Barry & @LandOLakesINC's @BethFordLOL for this important dialogue. https://t.co/hGO57LrWs3

Thanks, @JchatterleyCNN. We believe there is great promise in sustainability. It will transform how we live and work, drive new value and growth, and permeate all we do. That is why we are helping clients embed sustainability throughout their organizations. https://t.co/KQQIXe4EhX

Our research gives you three things you can do now to turn ESG commitments into action, by focusing on having the right data, technology and skills. This can help businesses not only meet their sustainability goals but also improve financial performance. https://t.co/Ej5K7Tmz1p

ESG and the way we measure it matter more each day. By taking action - from embracing sustainability in reporting to embedding it into strategies - businesses are becoming more competitive with investors, customers and talent. Thanks to @wef & @gilliantett for hosting this panel. https://t.co/iWy1Je0dot

Thanks, @SquawkCNBC & @andrewrsorkin for having me and @ptj_official on to discuss America’s Most Just Companies #JUST100 list and for putting a spotlight on the importance of being just and doing the right thing. Doing so is not just good, but great for business and our people. https://t.co/Hz7KW3xu7b

Congrats to @Accenture's @DrBhaskarGhosh, @RP_automation and Gayathri Pallail on their book, which offers clear actions to incorporate automation and AI in organizations. When leaders enable technologies, they empower people to think creatively, critically and with empathy. https://t.co/ILn0xNaLt5

Joys of the season to one and all! May you have the happiest of holidays. https://t.co/lEDiFkZBvG

.@Lounibos, your team @Accenture Ventures and Project Spotlight are unleashing powerful innovation with tech startups like @_skyhive. It’s a great example of the opportunity for business to help advance economic empowerment & inclusion through technology. https://t.co/Y4baWixuxr

Congratulations to President-elect Biden and VP-elect Harris. Now more than ever I think of our nation’s motto – E Pluribus Unum – “out of many, one.” This is the time to come together to defeat the pandemic and rebuild the economy for the benefit of all. https://t.co/KxpffQgEWj

Thank you, @leetmoore01, and thanks to our @Accenture Midwest team for successfully adapting our summer analyst internship program to the new digital reality. And congratulations to all of our summer analysts. I’m so impressed by your flexibility and talent! https://t.co/CNSS0SeN1D

Today, we officially launch the @MIT and @Accenture Convergence Initiative for Industry and Technology. The rapid progress the world needs depends on industries learning from each other, tech leaders and diverse perspectives across business and academia. https://t.co/BaXruXfGCb https://t.co/hOlHO4jPMt

Congratulations Wolters Kluwer CEO and @Accenture board member Nancy McKinstry! It is wonderful to see you’ve been honored on the @FortuneMagazine Most Powerful Women International list again. https://t.co/9Eqv7O30qT

The Grace Hopper Celebration of Women in Computing #GHC20 is the world’s largest gathering of women technologists. I know this year’s reimagined virtual @GHC will again connect, guide and inspire women in technology. @Accenture_US is a proud partner! https://t.co/cwZUWoGmVB

Our Q4 & FY20 results demonstrate our relevance and resilience, our ability to pivot rapidly, the power of our relationships with the world’s leading companies and ecosystem partners, and our commitment to being a responsible business. Thanks to our people for always being >. https://t.co/c5QIRmJaSC

Today we announced our Q3 financial results. I am proud of how our leaders and people have come together amid unprecedented challenges and have continued to deliver on our commitments to our shareholders, our clients, our people and our communities. https://t.co/ffZmjGW59i https://t.co/y3Mj8NjLU3

We’re seeing an accelerated need for Cloud and for people who can help our clients realize its full value. Welcome to the family @gekko_sas - a great addition to our @Accenture AWS Business Group in France, Belgium, Luxembourg & the Netherlands and our strong @awscloud solutions. https://t.co/VIRbiShX1S

Thanks for a great conversation @CSIS, @handrewschwartz and Scott Miller. I appreciated the question about opportunities @Accenture is seeing in AI and automation. Along with the imperative to reskill workers, this continues to be a huge area of focus for us and for our clients. https://t.co/MXebqGfK2Y

Great interview with @Accenture’s Saleem Janmohamed. You’re right: Cloud capability has never been more important, and it’s possible to get up to speed quickly. @theCUBE and @JeffFrick https://t.co/BRbr1HJwXI

Thanks for an engaging conversation last week on anticorruption and transparency, @wef Partnering Against Corruption Initiative #PACI spring meeting. I was  encouraged by the possibilities around Tech for Integrity. It was an honor to co-chair with you, @PPouyanne #Integrity2030 https://t.co/2eEcWJJGR9

Thank you @andrewrsorkin for hosting me to talk about the actions we are taking at Accenture and in our communities  to fight racism and create more economic opportunity for African Americans. Black lives must matter inside and outside @Accenture. https://t.co/z4z0sdHJyW

I was incredibly excited to visit Japan last week to meet with key clients and business partners, and spend time with our local Accenture leaders and teams. So many highlights, including an employee town hall and a panel focused on our Japan women leaders and navigating careers. https://t.co/5iuNS1k4AB

It is an honor to be recognized as one of the #WorldsMostEthicalCompanies by @ethisphere. At Accenture, we believe that businesses have both an opportunity and an obligation to be a force for good in the world. I am so proud to see this commitment every day in our people. https://t.co/IWsj9NpVLr

Off to a great start with strong financial results for Q1 of FY20, continuing our momentum from FY19. I want to thank every one of our more than 500,000 @Accenture people worldwide for their incredible commitment and dedication to serving our clients. https://t.co/rKUNSqPoQj https://t.co/h6UANoMs5C

I spent a great few days in Boston last week for @Accenture's earnings announcement. A special highlight was my first official town hall as CEO, held at our Innovation Hub, where I was energized by the nearly 250 of our people who joined me. Thanks to all for a terrific event! https://t.co/qtOv6u2da3
